title: Shrek
short_plot_summary: Shrek, a grumpy green ogre, embarks on a quest to save a princess and reclaim his swamp from a villainous lord, accompanied by a talking donkey.
explanation: A green circle, representing the distinctive color of Shrek the ogre
A horse, representing Donkey, Shrek's loyal and talkative sidekick
A castle, indicating the place where Princess Fiona is held captive
A dragon, symbolizing the obstacle Shrek and Donkey must overcome to save Princess Fiona
A princess, representing Princess Fiona, who Shrek must rescue
